eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext

Class Term

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.opendata.semtext.Term
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasMetadata, Span, Serializable

    @Immutable
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class Term
extends Object
implements Span, Serializable, HasMetadata
    Represents text marked with some meaning. Text can contain spaces, like i.e. "hot dog".
    Author:
    David Leoni
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getMeaningStatus

      • getStart

        public int getStart()
        Description copied from interface: Span
        An absolute start offset based on the text of the SemText containing this span. The offset is positioned at the first character of the span, so for span getStart would be 0. 
         I see
 012345
        In the special case of empty span, getStart and getEnd must concide.
        Specified by:
        getStart in interface Span

      • getEnd

        public int getEnd()
        Description copied from interface: Span
        An absolute getEnd offset based on the text of the SemText containing this span. The offset is positioned *after* the last character of the sentence, so for span 
         I see
 012345
        getEnd would be 5. In the special case of empty span, getStart and getEnd must concide.
        Specified by:
        getEnd in interface Span

      • getSelectedMeaning

        @Nullable
public Meaning getSelectedMeaning()
        Returns the selected meaning. Note selected meaning can be partial, that is, have empty URL or meaning kind set to UNKNOWN, or both.
        • SELECTED: Returns the selected meaning. Meaning will have a non-empty ID.
        • TO_DISAMBIGUATE: Returns null
        • NOT_SURE: Returns null
        • VALIDATED: Returns the selected meaning, with a valid ID.

      • with

        public Term with(Iterable<Meaning> meanings)
        Returns a new term with the provided meanings. Internally, a new list of normalized and deduplicated meanings will be stored.
        Parameters:
        meanings - won't be changed by the method. When deduplicating, meanings occurring first will be used.

      • with

        public Term with(MeaningStatus meaningStatus,
        @Nullable
        Meaning selectedMeaning)
        A new term is returned with the provided pair meaning status and selected meaning set.
        Parameters:
        meaningStatus -
        selectedMeaning - if unknown use null

      • withMetadata

        public Term withMetadata(String namespace,
                Object metadata)
        Returns a copy of this object with the provided metadata set under the given namespace.
        Parameters:
        metadata - Must be an immutable object.

      • of

        public static Term of(int start,
      int end,
      MeaningStatus meaningStatus,
      Meaning selectedMeaning)
        Factory method for a Term with only one meaning. Meaning probabilities are stored deduplicated and normalized so total sum is 1.0 .
        Parameters:
        start - 0-indexed span offset start. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        end - the position of the character immediately *after* the term itself. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        meaningStatus - Must have a corresponding correct selectedMeaning. See SemTexts.checkMeaningStatus method.
        selectedMeaning - Must have a corresponding correct meaningStatus. See SemTexts.checkMeaningStatus method.

      • of

        public static Term of(int start,
      int end,
      MeaningStatus meaningStatus,
      @Nullable
      Meaning selectedMeaning,
      Iterable<Meaning> meanings)
        Factory method for a Term. Meaning probabilities are stored deduplicated and normalized so total sum is 1.0 .
        Parameters:
        start - 0-indexed span offset start. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        end - the position of the character immediately *after* the term itself. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        meaningStatus - Must have a corresponding correct selectedMeaning. See SemTexts.checkMeaningStatus method.
        selectedMeaning - Must have a corresponding correct meaningStatus. See SemTexts.checkMeaningStatus method.
        meanings - the suggested meanings. Internally, a new collection is created to store the deduplicated meanings with normalized probabilities.

      • of

        public static Term of(int start,
      int end,
      MeaningStatus meaningStatus,
      @Nullable
      Meaning selectedMeaning,
      Iterable<Meaning> meanings,
      Map<String,?> metadata)
        Factory method for a Term. Meaning probabilities are stored deduplicated and normalized so total sum is 1.0 .
        Parameters:
        start - 0-indexed span offset start. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        end - the position of the character immediately *after* the term itself. Position is absolute with respect to the text stored in the SemText container.
        meaningStatus - Must have a corresponding correct selectedMeaning. See SemTexts.checkMeaningStatus method.
        selectedMeaning - Must have a corresponding correct meaningStatus. See SemTexts.checkMeaningStatus method.
        meanings - the suggested meanings. Internally, a new collection is created to store the deduplicated meanings with normalized probabilities.
        metadata - a map of metadata. Provided metadata objects must be immutable.
